Reviews.Content: overlooking courtyard bath comfortable trip rome usual sites hotel located easy cab drivers hotel referenced termini breakfast buffet bit crowded food ok bar drinks including cokes pricey staff helpful overly friendly

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel near Roma Termini”
Reviews.Author: graphicsights
Reviews.Content: stayed september 11 dissapointed considered reason 4star travellers hotel 3 star location excellent avoid costly taxis 10 minute walk roma termini station 3045 minute power walk trevi fountain 15 minute walk colloseum front desk nice helpful provided superior bathroom cleaned security issue inroom safe provided foc wifi included throughout stay hotel 1 hallways stink cigarette smoke stink mean strong soaked stench implement enforce smoking policy hotel limit floors lastly included breakfast wasnt eggs cold strange looking rest selection breads fruit ok eggs breaky compared prices rest rome probably cant overlook hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Location! Even quieter rooms!”
Reviews.Author: jennypenny12
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel inadvertently travel plans changed italy stayed 4 3 hotels rome conveniently located near bustling termini main train station rome pleasantly quietest hotel stayed rome hear guests moving hear people leaving morning doors closing clean quiet adequate spread breakfast selfservice coffee cappuccino tea machine disposal traditional hot american breakfast options scrabbled eggs bacon downside free wifi spotty wish stayed definitely 1 choice return italy

Reviews.Title: “Good location, average hotel”
Reviews.Author: racecar053
Reviews.Content: rome days sightseeing tours stayed hotel nights hotel short walk central termini station via cavour location close metro station hotel staff accomodating complimentary internet access computer station lobby internet intermittently breakfast soso fitness center actually sister hotel street marcello recommended restaurant nearby dinner nice shopping restaurants via cavour via nazionale overall experience

Reviews.Title: “Basic for a expensive hotel”
Reviews.Author: mon1987
Reviews.Content: rome weekend partners 30th birthday nice hotel close mail stations rome train termini walked hotel 10 minutes easy hotel posh entering nice staff reception basic 530 euro payed 3 nights bed bad bad noisy outside due main road aircon noisy couldnt win warm night noise main road noise aircon sounded slightly quiter hair dryer cleaners noisy corridors morning wont lie stay hear talk loud own language anoying door shout bathroom bad drainage read reviews smell shower self pathetic people sooo wrong smell actually feel ill location hotel rough wouldnt advise walk round late night 10pm hotel gettin beat police breakfast basic english items bacon scrambled egg bacon egg wasnt cooked england overall hotel price location poor

Reviews.Title: “Excellect, Great Hotel.”
